posts.message:
hi guys, 

this is our new app for the android platform, let me introduce Join to you all : 

Join is an app that lets you turn a group of Android devices into a complete network so you can share files and view them simultaneously with those around you in real time.
No need for WIFI hotspots, 3G or 4G networks when setting up a group. Join connects using only your Android device.
Current features:

- Sound sharing: You can create a sound sharing group and enjoy the synchronize surround sound over multiple Android devices. One device holds the sound file, all other devices act like an integrated speaker system.

- Photo sharing: Use Join to create a photo sharing group and enjoy watching your best moments with friends on all your screens

- Works on any type of smartphone or tablet. Join is a simple app, easy to use, and provides the best user experience on any Android device.

- No need for file transfers among your devices anymore, use Join to share what you want, when you want.

this is the first version of it .. we need your feedback and if you like it please share it ^_^ 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.join_team.join

our page
https://www.facebook.com/JoinApp

and you will find a video describing its features .. thanks in advance ^_^

The first Bitcoin Egypt Hangout, join us and invite your friends.
Every attendee will get pre-funded wallet with 10$ worth of Bitcoin from BitOasis sponsor of the event.
posts.caption: Bitcoin Egypt Hangout
posts.description:
الحدث عبارة عن Google hangout برعاية @[668008169981795:274:BitOasis] يتحدث فيه @[100002421526438:2048:Mostafa Farghaly] عن ال Bitcoin و يجيب علي كل اسألتكم المتعلقة بال Bitcoin والعملات المشفرة Crypto-currencies الاخري .

مصطفي فرغلي Bitcoin developer بشركة BitOasis راعية الحدث أول Bitcoin Exchange فى الشرق الاوسط يعمل بنظام محافظ HDM - Hierarchical Deterministic Multi-Siganture ، مصطفي مؤسس @[404339133056468:69:Bitcoin Egypt Users Group] و مؤلف كتاب Bitcoin Programming .

 مواضيع ال Hangout كالتالي:
- ما هو Bitcoin و كيف يختلف عن العملات وانظمة الدفع الاخري
- ما هو ال Bitcoin Address و ال Private/Public Keys
- ماهو Bitcoin Mining و ال Hashrate و ال Difficulty 
- ما هو Bitcoin Protocol و من مسئول عنه 
- ما هو ال Blockchain
- ما هو ال transaction و ال confirmations 
- ما هي محافظ ال Bitcoin و ماهي انواعها
- اين يمكنني شراء و استخدام Bitcoin 
- كيف استقبل Bitcoin كتاجر
- المضاربة فى ال Bitcoin 
- العملات الاخري Altcoins 
- برمجة تطبيقات ال Bitcoin

posts.message:
Salam 3likom..
Is there any unified communication app (free or open source) for team collaboration up to 50 employees ? 
I know dozens but with pricing conditions also missing a lot of features.
I used M.S Lync for about  4 years and it was enough, now I have moved to a new environment with missing U.C methodologies .
Kindly advise.

what is the best PHP files encoder software ?

http://www.sourceguardian.com/

http://phpshield.com
